The city is surrounded by Laguna Woods to the North,  Mission Viejo to the east and Laguna Niguel to the west.  Very much a bedroom community of upper middle to high class residential homes, the community is safe and well maintained. Located approximately 15 min from the Pacific Ocean and Dana Point.
Laguna Hills is located approximately 50 miles south of
on Interstate 5.  Exits going south include El Toro Road and Alicia Parkway.
John Wayne Airport is the closest airport.

value: In addition to typical sports such as basketball, tennis, football, etc., ice skating is available in Aliso Viejo just a 5 minute drive away from the center of town.
